items.name: Draven's Axe
items.desc:
Gain 1% Attack Damage per gold in your bank (up to 50 gold).Attacks grant 1 stack, up to 100 times. At full stacks, grant 7 gold.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

items.name: Crown of Champions
items.desc:
Every 8 seconds, the wearer's next basic attack deals 9001x the amount of gold in your bank as true damage.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

items.name: Glacial Mallet
items.desc:
Attacks have a chance to Stun icon stun enemies and deal bonus magic damage.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

items.name: Boss Knuckles
items.desc:
When the holder first drops below 60% Health, they become The Boss The Boss and leave combat to start doing sit-ups. Each sit-up restores maximum Health and grants Attack Speed. If all allies die, The Boss will immediately return to combat.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
